lang.p: "Web Messanger" - is unique software allowing visitors of your site to chat with your operators.
lang.h: Why should I use Web Messenger?
lang.p: "Web Messenger" makes it easier to communicate with existing and potential clients. It will significantly increase conversion rates and online sales of your web site.
You should place the button of Web Messanger at your site. Your visitors click the button and chat with your operators who help them.
